Not looking any further than 3 weeks currently, lots of defender transfers needed 😂 #FPL

Would you either:

- use 2FTs on Dawson (shu) & Tsimikas (lut) for Porro (CHE) & Castagne (MUN)
- sell Porro for Dawson, roll & play Castagne
- sell Castagne for Dawson, roll & play Porro
- sell Porro for Tsimikas, roll & bench Castagne

I've £0.0m ITB.

#FPL

I've 2 FTs this week.

Will do Porro to Dawson.

Was also planning Castagne out for Tsimikas.

Would you retain Castagne (MUN) & roll?

#FPL

More applicable this week if you need to transfer a DEF. Wolves faces Sheffield United, not only the worst defense in the league but also the worst team at defending set pieces. 6 goals conceded straight from set pieces and Craig Dawson could make that 7.

bur, EVE, lut, whu, BOU
